analyzed: rnam grangs des na yid kyi 'dus te reg pa byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de lta bu'ang med cing mi dmigs so //

analyzed: gzhan yang mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ni mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bas stong ste /

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /

original: byang chub sems dpa' med do //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' med do //
translated: for this reason you should know that the bodhisattva is also neither existent nor nonexistent.

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /

analyzed: rnam grangs des na mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de lta bu'ang med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: for this reason you should know that the bodhisattva is also neither existent nor nonexistent.🔽Venerable Śāradvatīputra,🔽in the same vein, the sensory element of sights is empty of the sensory element of sights,🔽and so on until we come to: the sensory element of mental phenomena is empty of the sensory element of mental phenomena.

original: rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ni rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bas stong ste /
analyzed: rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ni rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bas stong ste /

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: for this reason you should know that the bodhisattva is also neither existent nor nonexistent.🔽Venerable Śāradvatīputra,🔽in the same vein, the sensory element of visual consciousness is empty of the sensory element of visual consciousness,🔽and so on until we come to: the sensory element of mental consciousness is empty of the sensory element of mental consciousness.

analyzed: stong pa nyid la rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba med /
translated: In emptiness there is no nose contact conditioned by the nose,

original: byang chub sems dpa' med do //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' med do //
translated: and there is no bodhisattva.

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: Venerable Śāradvatīputra,

original: rnam grangs des na rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de lta bu'ang med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: rnam grangs des na rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de lta bu'ang med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: for this reason this so-called bodhisattva, who is described as nose contact conditioned by the nose, does not exist and is not apprehended.

original: sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba @40b ni sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bas stong ste /
analyzed: sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba @40b ni sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bas stong ste /
translated: “The feeling that arises from the condition of the contact of the nose is empty of the feeling that arises from the condition of the contact of the nose.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: And why?

original: stong pa nyid la sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba med /
analyzed: stong pa nyid la sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba med /
translated: In emptiness there is no feeling that arises from the condition of the contact of the nose,

original: byang chub sems dpa' med do //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' med do //
translated: and there is no bodhisattva.

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: Venerable Śāradvatīputra,

original: rnam grangs des na sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de lta bu'ang med cing mi dmigs so /
analyzed: rnam grangs des na sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de lta bu'ang med cing mi dmigs so /
translated: for this reason this so-called bodhisattva, who is described as the feeling that arises from the condition of the contact of the nose, does not exist and is not apprehended.

original: lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ni lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bas stong ste //
analyzed: lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ni lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bas stong ste //
translated: “The condition of contact at the tongue is empty of the condition of contact at the tongue.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: And why?

original: stong pa nyid la lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba med /
analyzed: stong pa nyid la lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba med /
translated: Because emptiness is not the condition of contact at the tongue.

original: byang chub sems dpa' med do //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' med do //
translated: There is no bodhisattva at all.

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu rnam grangs des na lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de lta bu'ang med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu rnam grangs des na lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de lta bu'ang med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: For this reason, Venerable Śāradvatīputra, one cannot attain emancipation in the ultimate through the vehicle of the bodhisattvas by apprehending anything.

original: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ni lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bas stong ste /
analyzed: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ni lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bas stong ste /
translated: “The condition of contact at the body is empty of the condition of contact at the body.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: And why?

original: stong pa nyid la lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba med /
analyzed: stong pa nyid la lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba med /
translated: Because emptiness is not the condition of contact at the body.

original: byang chub sems dpa' med do //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' med do //
translated: There is no bodhisattva at all.

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: Venerable Śāradvatīputra,

original: rnam grangs des na lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de lta bu'ang med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: rnam grangs des na lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de lta bu'ang med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: For this reason, the designation ‘bodhisattva’ for a feeling that arises from the condition of contact through the union of body is nowhere to be seen.

original: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ni yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bas stong ste /
analyzed: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ni yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bas stong ste /

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /

analyzed: stong pa nyid la yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor @41a *//

original: ba med / byang chub sems dpa' med do //
analyzed: ba med / byang chub sems dpa' med do //
translated: and a bodhisattva is nowhere to be seen.

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: Venerable Śāradvatīputra,

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
